## Champion.id property

The ID of the champion. To get the ID, in the champion's name - Capitalize the words - Remove any spaces and special characters - The words after a `'` - such as in Kai'sa, remain lowercase.

Examples: - Kayn -<!-- -->&gt; Kayn - Cho'Gath -<!-- -->&gt; Chogath - Dr. Mundo -<!-- -->&gt; DrMundo

There are 2 exceptions to this rule. 1. Wukong -<!-- -->&gt; MonkeyKing 2. Renata Glasc -<!-- -->&gt; Renata

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly id: string;
```
